fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Trade, Consumers, International co-operation and development, Research and innovation, Public Health, Food Safety, Climate Action
industry_forums: Ceva is a member of AnimalHealthEurope who organizes events and fora in the European Parliament
eu_initiatives: Proposal for a Regulation on Veterinay medicinal products; proposal for a Regulation on the manufacture, placing on the market and use of medicated feed; EU Animal welfare policy; Animal health Policy; Trade Policy; Antibiotic resistance initiatives
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
belgium_office_address: Ceva Santé Animale S.A.N.V. 6 Avenue de la Métrologie
membership: Ceva Santé Animale is member of AnimalHealth Europe (formerly IFAH-Europe)
relevant_communication: Ceva Santé Animale has no current activity in terms of public communication or events.
goals__remit: Ceva Santé Animale discovers, develops, manufactures and markets veterinary vaccines and medicines globally, supported by technical services. Ceva serves veterinarians and animal owners.
